name: Click the Sound (Resilience)
description:
Click the sound is my first game to publish and it is very simple clicking game. Whenever you click the image, you will hear interesting sound effects and earn total score and specific image score. 

  As you earn more scores, the more images will unlock. The play time will take 20-30 minutes and try to achieve all achievements. 

https://resilience.itch.io/click-the-sound

          If you like the game and want to support, please go to download link and write good comments for me!
